title: Winter Olympics 2026: Centenary celebrations will reach a crescendo in Milano Cortina
desc: Milano Cortina 2026 sits at a pivotal moment in Olympic history, marking a century of the Winter Games.

title: Horseshoe Crab fossil found near Cliffs of Moher
desc: A horseshoe crab fossil dating back more than three hundred million years, has been discovered in the Clare County Council-managed Burren and Cliffs of Moher UNESCO Global Geopark. The fossil, which is only 2cm in size, has been identified as Euproops danae, a species familiar to the UK, Europe, Russia and North America. This is the […]

title: Jennifer Garner’s Once Upon a Farm Rises 17% After $198 Million IPO
desc: The closing price gives the company a market value of $847 million, based on the outstanding shares. Berkeley, California-based Once Upon a Farm sold about 7.6 million shares and the selling holders offered around 3.4 million shares, which priced in the middle of the $17 to $19 marketed range. Garner and former Annie’s Chief Executive Officer John Foraker joined in 2017.

title: Timothy Busfield indicted on four counts of child sexual contact in New Mexico
desc: A grand jury indictment announced on Friday supersedes initial charges brought by state prosecutors last month.

title: Hedge Funds Slash Bullish Natural Gas Bets to 13-Month Low
desc: Hedge funds cut bullish bets on US natural gas after forecasts for mild weather triggered the largest single-day price decline in front-month gas futures in 30 years, forcing traders with long positions to rapidly unwind those bets at a loss.

title: Can apes play pretend? Scientists use an imaginary tea party to find out
desc: For the first time, an experiment hints that an ape in captivity can have an imagination.

title: Dollar heads for weekly rise, yen slumps ahead of Japan's election
desc:
The dollar slipped from two-week highs on Friday, returning some safe-haven gains as risk assets rebounded from a deep rout driven by concerns over a surge in AI-related spending this year.

title: Updated Urticaria Guidelines Clarify Diagnosis, Biomarkers, Treatment Pathways
desc: The 2024 global update for urticaria preserves the stepwise algorithm and clarifies evidence on biomarkers, provocation testing, pediatric care, and emerging therapies.

title: Watch: Kiwi athletes take part in Winter Olympics opening ceremony
desc: Three‑time Olympic medallist Zoi Sadowski‑Synnott and freestyle skier Ben Barclay led the way as Aotearoa’s flagbearers, carrying the flag in the town of Livigno.
